welcome:
Hello, {name}! I am a weather forecast bot.

You can use the following commands:
/weather - Get current weather
/forecast - Get weather forecast
/setlanguage - Set preferred language
/help - Show list of commands
/about - Learn more about the bot
/location - Send location
/cancel - Cancel current action
start: Hello! I am a weather forecast bot. Use /weather to get current weather and /forecast for weather forecast.
weather_not_found: Could not find city: {city}. Please try again.
forecast_not_found: Could not find city: {city}. Please try again.
no_city_provided: Please enter the city name after the command.
help:
Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/help - Show list of available commands
/weather - Get current weather
/forecast - Get weather forecast
/setlanguage - Set preferred language
/about - Learn more about the bot
/location - Send location
/cancel - Cancel current action
invalid_command: Invalid command. Use /help to see available commands.
api_error: An error occurred while fetching data. Please try again later.
processing_error: An error occurred while processing weather data.
invalid_city: Invalid city name. Please try again.
about: This bot provides up-to-date weather information and a weekly forecast. It supports multiple languages and uses visual elements to enhance information delivery.
